entry.string: Invalid user (#(1)) while getting users blogs
entry.translation: Infeleed user (#(1)) vheele-a getteeng users blugs

entry.string: The configured publication type has no root category!
entry.translation: Zee cunffeegoored poobleeceshun type-a hes nu ruut cetegury!

entry.string: No publication type is registered for blogging on this site
entry.translation: Nu poobleeceshun type-a is regeestered fur bluggeeng oon thees seete

entry.string: The articles module is not hooked up to any blog categories
entry.translation: Zee erteecles mudoole-a is nut huuked up tu uny blug cetegureees
